error.invalid_dongle_path: Could not connect to EnOcean dongle. Verify the path or network URL is correct and the device is accessible.

data_description.device: Path to your EnOcean dongle. Supports local USB devices and network serial connections.

Path to your EnOcean dongle.

Examples:
• Local USB: `/dev/ttyUSB0` or `/dev/serial/by-id/usb-EnOcean_...`
• Network (RFC2217): `rfc2217://hostname:port`
• Network (raw socket): `socket://hostname:port`

manual.description: Enter the path to your EnOcean dongle or network URL for remote access.
